thread.title: NAPW Nina Baranchuk, CFA / Chief Investment Officer, First Commonwealth Advisors, Its
thread.title_full: NAPW Inducts Nina Baranchuk, CFA / Chief Investment Officer, First Commonwealth Advisors, Into Its VIP Professional Woman of the Year Circle

author: Lisa Mancuso
title: NAPW Nina Baranchuk, CFA / Chief Investment Officer, First Commonwealth Advisors, Its
text:
Nina Baranchuk wealth management. Nina Jones. “Her outstanding work as a Chief Investment Officer and her continued pursuit of professional excellence illustrates her commitment to her chosen field.”
Nina Baranchuk has over 30 years of exceptional experience in investing and asset management for various institutions and high-net-worth individuals. Using her proven skills in analytics and communications, she has excelled in a variety of wealth management-related roles throughout her career as both an individual contributor and a group leader.
Ms. Baranchuk is currently the Chief Investment Officer at First Commonwealth Advisors , which specializes in personal banking, mortgage and business banking. With her broad scope of knowledge in wealth management, she has successfully developed investment solutions that have met the unique needs of each of her clients.
A respected figure among her peers, Ms. Baranchuk has established a well-known reputation for her expertise in the areas of account management, customer relations, capital markets, investment business management and financial analysis. Ms. Baranchuk received her Master of Business Administration degree in Business and Finance from the University of Delaware. She keeps pace with the exciting changes that accompany the evolution of her profession through her active membership with the CFA Society.
Awards & Accomplishments: M.B.A., University of Delaware, Business and Finance; Bachelor’s, University of Delaware – Lerner College of Business and Economics, Economics
